name: cordova-plugin-webviewcolor
description: This plugin allows you to change the default PhoneGap background color (black). Especially on iOS7, when you use the native date picker or a html selectbox, the text is hard to read against the black background (so that's the only currently supported platform).
author: Eddy Verbruggen <eddyverbruggen@gmail.com> (https://github.com/EddyVerbruggen)
